SimpleDataListSpec.Name: Items Enclosed Simple Data List
SimpleDataListSpec.Description: Items Enclosed From Sponsor To Child
SimpleDataListSpec.Author: Bill Elfstrom

SPSimpleList.common:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_ITEMSENCLOSEDSIMPLEDATALIST as select ID as VALUE, DESCRIPTION as LABEL from dbo.USR_ITEMSENCLOSEDCODE order by DESCRIPTION
